amendment.description: An amendment numbered 323 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the salaries and expenses of personnel of the Department of Agriculture to provide benefits described in section 1001D(b)(1)(C) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (7 U.S.C. 1308-3a(b)(1)(C)) to a person or legal entity in excess of $250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A114) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 241 (Roll no. 114).
